name: seat_geek
description: SeatGeek Platform API provides access to events, venues, and performers data for concerts, sports, theater, and other live entertainment

tools.name: SEAT_GEEK_GET_EVENT_DETAILS
tools.description: Get comprehensive details about a specific event including venue, performers, date/time, and ticket information.

event_id.title: Event Id
event_id.description: The unique ID of the event to retrieve details for.

tools.name: SEAT_GEEK_GET_EVENT_RECOMMENDATIONS
tools.description: Get personalized event recommendations based on your favorite performers, events, or location. Discover new events you might enjoy.

lat.title: Lat
lat.description: Latitude for location-based recommendations. Must be provided with longitude.

lon.title: Lon
lon.description: Longitude for location-based recommendations. Must be provided with latitude.

geoip.title: Geoip
geoip.description: Use 'true' to geolocate by client IP or provide a specific IP address.

range.title: Range
range.description: Radius from geolocation point to search within. Default is 200mi.

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: Number of results per page. Default is 10.

events_id.title: Events Id
events_id.description: One or more event IDs to use as recommendation seeds. Comma-separated for multiple.

performers_id.title: Performers Id
performers_id.description: One or more performer IDs to use as recommendation seeds. Comma-separated for multiple.

tools.name: SEAT_GEEK_GET_EVENT_SEATING
tools.description: Get detailed section and row information for an event to understand the venue layout and available seating options. Useful for choosing the best seats.

event_id.title: Event Id
event_id.description: The unique ID of the event to retrieve seating information for.

tools.name: SEAT_GEEK_GET_PERFORMER_DETAILS
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific performer including images, scores, and related metadata.

performer_id.title: Performer Id
performer_id.description: The unique ID of the performer to retrieve details for.

tools.name: SEAT_GEEK_GET_PERFORMER_RECOMMENDATIONS
tools.description: Get recommendations for similar performers based on your interests. Discover new artists, bands, teams, or entertainers you might enjoy.

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: Number of results per page. Default is 10.

events_id.title: Events Id
events_id.description: One or more event IDs to use as recommendation seeds. Comma-separated for multiple.

performers_id.title: Performers Id
performers_id.description: One or more performer IDs to use as recommendation seeds. Comma-separated for multiple.

tools.name: SEAT_GEEK_GET_TAXONOMIES
tools.description: Get a list of all available event categories and types (taxonomies) used on SeatGeek. Useful for understanding event classification and filtering options.

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: Number of results per page. Default is 10.

tools.name: SEAT_GEEK_GET_VENUE_DETAILS
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific venue including location, address, and other metadata.

venue_id.title: Venue Id
venue_id.description: The unique ID of the venue to retrieve details for.

tools.name: SEAT_GEEK_SEARCH_EVENTS
tools.description: Search for events on SeatGeek by performers, venues, dates, or general queries. Find concerts, sports games, theater shows, and other live entertainment.

q.title: Q
q.description: General search query for events, performers, or venues. Supports natural language like 'yankees march' or 'skrillex on june 4th'.

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: Number of results per page. Default is 10.

venue_id.title: Venue Id
venue_id.description: Venue ID to filter events to a specific venue.

venue_city.title: Venue City
venue_city.description: City name to filter events by venue location.

venue_state.title: Venue State
venue_state.description: Two-letter state code to filter events by venue location.

datetime_utc.title: Datetime Utc
datetime_utc.description: Filter events by exact UTC date/time. Format: YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.

performers_id.title: Performers Id
performers_id.description: Performer ID(s) to filter events. Multiple IDs can be comma-separated for OR queries.

datetime_local.title: Datetime Local
datetime_local.description: Filter events by exact local date/time. Format: YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.

performers_slug.title: Performers Slug
performers_slug.description: Performer slug(s) to filter events. Use URL-friendly format.

datetime_utc_gte.title: Datetime Utc Gte
datetime_utc_gte.description: Filter events happening on or after this UTC date/time.

datetime_utc_lte.title: Datetime Utc Lte
datetime_utc_lte.description: Filter events happening on or before this UTC date/time.

tools.name: SEAT_GEEK_SEARCH_PERFORMERS
tools.description: Search for performers including artists, bands, sports teams, comedians, and more. Find your favorite entertainers and see their upcoming events.

q.title: Q
q.description: General search query for performers. Search artists, bands, sports teams, or any performers.

id.title: Id
id.description: Performer ID(s) to retrieve. Can be comma-separated for multiple performers.

slug.title: Slug
slug.description: Search for a specific performer by their slug (URL-friendly name).

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: Number of results per page. Default is 10.

tools.name: SEAT_GEEK_SEARCH_VENUES
tools.description: Search for venues by location, name, or other criteria. Find stadiums, theaters, concert halls, and other entertainment venues.

id.title: Id
id.description: Venue ID(s) to retrieve. Can be comma-separated for multiple venues.

state.title: State
state.description: Filter venues by state (use two-letter state code).

country.title: Country
country.description: Filter venues by country (use two-letter country code).

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: Number of results per page. Default is 10.
